titleStmt.title: The praise and dispraise of women very fruitfull to the well disposed minde, and delectable to the readers therof. And a fruitfull shorte dialogue vppon the sentence, know before thou knitte. C. Pyrrye.
titleStmt.author: Pyrrye, C.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
